channel.title: Stop posting pointless topics!
channel.description:
Hi i know this is wrong but sorry ,
These days this forum has become better and better , my opinion But these days loads of "new people" are posting useless topics like
"tips for becoming a mod" i think that u are behind getting some reputation..?!
1. i dont believe u need 40 rep+ 2. i think u just should be helpfull to any1
So what i trying to say ..
STOP POSTING POINTLESS TOPICS , KEEP THIS FORUM CLEAN
As it supposed to be..
Thnx
Called Enzo
P.S. Its ok if it get locked

item.title: Stop posting pointless topics!
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

my sig pwns =)
the same guy who posted the nonsense about how to become mod.
newbs will be newbs,noobs will always be noobs.

Read full topic

These days this forum has become better and better , my opinion
But these days loads of “new people” are posting useless topics like

“tips for becoming a mod” i think that u are behind getting some reputation…?!

  2. i think u just should be helpfull to any1

So what i trying to say …

STOP POSTING POINTLESS TOPICS , KEEP THIS FORUM CLEAN

Thnx

Called Enzo
